timeline.bodyText: Is the For a class that is not a record, null is returned. case handled in the native?  Wouldn't it be easier (and faster) to do the isRecord() before calling the native?
timeline.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText: Yes that case is handled in getRecordComponentsImpl. My thought was since isRecord() is also a native it would make more sense to have only one native call here instead of two.
replies.author: theresa-m

replies.bodyText: It's, after jitting, a FastJNI that will run quickly.  Much cheaper than the getRecordComponentsImpl JNI call
replies.author: DanHeidinga

timeline.author: DanHeidinga
